title: Navigation Bar Functionality
description: Verify navigation links direct correctly, highlight active routes, and animated mobile menu behaves as expected on various screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop screen size.
Verify all navigation links (Home, Case Files, Signals, Daughters of Dissent, Hall of Noise, Sponsors) are visible and clickable.
Click each navigation link and verify the URL changes accordingly.
Verify active route is visually highlighted in the navigation bar.
Resize window to mobile dimensions.
Verify hamburger menu icon appears; navigation links are hidden.
Click hamburger menu to open animated mobile menu.
Verify menu expands with animation and links are clickable.
Select a link inside mobile menu.
Verify navigation occurs and mobile menu closes with animation.
Test navigation on tablet screen size to confirm responsive layout correctness.
Verify navigation displays as per design for tablet resolution.

title: Article Listing with Category Filtering
description: Test article listing pages load data correctly with category filtering implementing AND logic, and handle empty or error states properly.

steps.description: Navigate to Case Files listing page.
Verify article cards load dynamically from API with loading state shown initially.
Apply single category filter and observe the filtered results.
Verify all displayed articles belong to the selected category.
Apply multiple category filters to test AND logic.
Verify articles displayed contain all selected categories.
Clear filters and verify all articles return.
Simulate API error or no articles found scenario.
Verify empty state or error message is displayed appropriately.
Repeat above steps on Signals and Daughters of Dissent listing pages.
Verify consistency in behavior across all thematic sections.
Test listing pages on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
Verify layout adapts correctly and is responsive.

title: Detailed Article Page Rendering
description: Verify individual article pages render markdown content accurately with category badges and scroll progress indicator functioning as intended.

steps.description: Navigate to any article detail page from a listing.
Verify markdown elements render correctly: headings, paragraphs, lists, code blocks, tables, images.
Verify category badges are displayed and correspond to article categories.
Scroll article content.
Verify scroll progress indicator updates accurately reflecting scroll position.
Click navigation elements to return to listing or move to other articles.
Verify navigation works without errors.
Test article detail pages on multiple devices including mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Verify responsive design correctness.

title: Admin Panel Authentication and Access Control
description: Ensure the admin panel is protected by password authentication and unauthorized access is prevented.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin panel page.
Verify login prompt for password appears.
Attempt login with empty password.
Verify error message indicating password requirement.
Attempt login with incorrect password.
Verify login failure and error feedback.
Attempt login with correct password.
Verify successful authentication and access to admin dashboard.
Try accessing protected admin APIs without authentication token.
Verify access denied with appropriate error.

title: Admin CRUD Operations for Articles
description: Verify creating, updating, and deleting articles in admin panel updates UI and persists changes in the database correctly.

steps.description: Login to admin panel successfully.
Select a thematic section (Case Files, Signals, or Daughters of Dissent).
Create a new article by filling required fields and submitting.
Verify the new article appears immediately in the admin UI list.
Navigate to the public facing article listing and verify the new article is listed.
Update an existing article's title and content in the admin panel.
Verify changes reflect immediately in the admin UI and public site.
Delete an article in the admin panel.
Verify article is removed from admin UI and no longer visible on public site.
Attempt invalid input during create/update (e.g., empty required fields).
Verify validation errors are shown and action is blocked.

title: Admin Audio Upload Management for Hall of Noise
description: Test uploading audio files, listing, and managing audio metadata in the Hall of Noise admin section with persistence and UI updates.

steps.description: Login to admin panel and navigate to Hall of Noise section.
Upload valid audio file with associated metadata.
Verify upload success message and audio appears in admin list.
Attempt to upload invalid file types (e.g., images).
Verify error message indicating invalid file type.
Delete an uploaded audio file entry.
Verify audio metadata is removed from admin UI and database.
Verify Hall of Noise public API returns correct audio metadata with valid URLs.
Ensure audio URLs are accessible publicly.

title: Dark Mode Support and Theme Toggle
description: Verify dark mode functionality works with system preference detection and manual toggle, and UI updates accordingly.

steps.description: Load site with system preference set to light mode.
Verify site loads in light mode by default.
Toggle theme toggle button to dark mode.
Verify site switches to dark mode immediately.
Refresh the page.
Verify selected theme preference persists across page reload.
Change system preference to dark mode and reload site.
Verify site respects system preference and loads in dark mode.

title: Framer Motion Animations with Reduced Motion Accessibility
description: Verify UI animations run smoothly by default and respect user preference to reduce motion, disabling or minimizing animations.

steps.description: Load site with default motion settings.
Verify page transitions, card reveals, scroll effects, and menu animations run smoothly without UI glitches.
Set system/user preference for reduced motion.
Reload site and verify animations are minimized or disabled according to preference.
Navigate across pages to confirm motion reduction is consistent.
Verify accessibility compliance with reduced motion without loss of functionality.

title: API Endpoint Integration and Error Handling
description: Test API endpoints for Supabase integration handle data fetching, mutations, and errors gracefully across all sections.

steps.description: Call Case Files, Signals, Daughters of Dissent API endpoints with valid requests.
Verify responses contain expected article data.
Call Hall of Noise audio API endpoint and verify audio metadata with public URLs.
Verify data correctness and accessibility.
Trigger API calls with invalid parameters or when database is unreachable (simulate failures).
Verify API returns proper error codes and messages without crashing.
For Admin CRUD endpoints, send requests with missing or invalid authentication.
Verify unauthorized access is correctly blocked.

title: Responsive Design Verification across Key Pages
description: Verify that the layout and UI components adapt correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes for Home, Article Listings, Detail Pages, Admin Panel, and Sponsors Pages.

steps.description: Open Home page on mobile, tablet, and desktop resolutions.
Verify hero section, navigation, and content adapt fluidly without layout breakage.
Navigate to article listing pages on each device size.
Verify grid layouts and filtering UI adapts correctly and usability is preserved.
Open article detail pages on all device types.
Confirm markdown content, badges, and scroll progress bar adjust properly.
Login to admin and check dashboard layout responsiveness.
Verify tables, forms, and file upload UI components render well on small and large screens.
Open Sponsors page on different devices.
Verify cards display in responsive grid with working animations.

title: Hall of Noise Coming Soon Page
description: Verify the Hall of Noise page displays coming soon messaging with animated background and contains functional links to other sections.

steps.description: Navigate to Hall of Noise page.
Verify 'Coming Soon' message is visible and styled as per design.
Verify animated background elements are rendered and animate smoothly.
Click on links provided in the page to other sections.
Verify links navigate correctly to their respective pages.
Test page responsiveness on various device sizes.
Verify layout and animations adapt correctly without performance degradation.
